description: Wrapping up an all-star week here on BelAmiOnline we have the impossibly handsome Nils Tatum together with rising star, Niko Vangelis. This Niko's 2nd scene with us and you can still see that having sex in front of the camera is a bit of a strange experience for him. Luckily he has someone as experienced and caring as Nils to make the whole experience more enjoyable. Once the sex heats up a bit though he seems to even forget that Marty is there filming the whole thing.
title: Bel Ami Update - Fun With Newbie
